title: Restaurant Review
description: Write a review about a restaurant you have visited.

prompt.description: Describe a restaurant you visited. Talk about the food, service, price, and whether you would recommend it.
requirements: Name the restaurant and describe its location
Use quantifiers (some, a few, much, many)
Share your opinion about the food and service

exampleSentences.sentence: Last week, I went to a Korean restaurant near my office.
I ordered some bibimbap and a few side dishes.
The food was delicious and the portions were generous.
The service was a bit slow, but the waiter was friendly.
I give it 4 out of 5 stars and would definitely go back.
exampleSentences.translation: 5점 만점에 4점을 주고 꼭 다시 갈 것입니다.

vocabularyHelp.example: The soup was a bit bland.

items: Did you name and locate the restaurant?
Did you describe what you ate?
Did you use quantifiers (some, a few, much)?
Did you use countable/uncountable nouns correctly?
Did you use 'much' with uncountable nouns?
Did you use 'many' with countable nouns?
Does it have a clear structure?
